00018 using std::cerr;
00019 using std::cout;
00020 using std::endl;
00021 
00022 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00023 {
00024   MinetHandle mux;
00025   MinetHandle sock;
00026 
00027   MinetInit(MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE);
00028 
00029   mux=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX) ? MinetConnect(MINET_IP_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00030   sock=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00031 
00032   if (mux==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX)) {
00033     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to ip_mux"));
00034     return -1;
00035   }
00036   if (sock==MINET_NOHANDLE && MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE)) {
00037     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from sock_module"));
00038     return -1;
00039   }
00040 
00041   cerr << "ipother_module handling non-UDP, non-TCP, non-ICMP traffic......."<<endl;
00042 
00043   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("ipother_module handling non-UDP, non-TCP, non-ICMP traffic........"));
00044 
00045   MinetEvent event;
00046 
00047   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
00048     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow
00049         || event.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
00050       MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
00051     } else {
00052       if (event.handle==mux) {
00053         Packet p;
00054         MinetReceive(mux,p);
00055       }
00056       if (event.handle==sock) {
00057         SockRequestResponse req;
00058         MinetReceive(sock,req);
00059         switch (req.type) {
00060         case STATUS:
00061           // ignored, no response needed
00062           break;
00063         case CONNECT:
00064         case ACCEPT:
00065         case WRITE:
00066         case FORWARD:
00067         case CLOSE:
00068         default:
00069           {
00070             SockRequestResponse repl;
00071             // repl.type=SockRequestResponse::STATUS;
00072             repl.type=STATUS;
00073             repl.error=EWHAT;
00074             MinetSend(sock,repl);
00075           }
00076         }
00077       }
00078     }
00079   }
00080   return 0;
00081 }
